title: However, the total permissible FSI in such cases will be restricted to a maximum of 4 FSI
clause_text: However, the total permissible FSI in such cases will be restricted to a maximum of 4 FSI. Provided further that in such cases the total permissible FSI may be allowed to be utilized by way of NTC FSI, TDR or Additional FSI by payment of premium in various combinations, at the option of the developer. (Clause 12 kept in abeyance)

source_pdf.text_snippet: However, the total permissible FSI in such cases will be restricted to a maximum of 4 FSI. Provided further that in such cases the total permissible FSI may be allowed to be utilized by way of NTC FSI
